item.title: 中国国防企业业绩飙升，巴基斯坦大肆采购武器
item.description: 周一，在巴基斯坦表示有意购买中国最先进的战斗机之一作为重大武器采购的一部分后，中国国防公司的股票大涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese defense companies rallied Monday, after Pakistan said it intends to buy one of the Asian power’s most-advanced fighter jets as a part of major arms purchase.】

item.title: 高通公司同意以 24 亿美元收购英国上市公司 Alphawave
item.description: 高通公司已同意以约 24 亿美元现金收购在伦敦上市的半导体公司 Alphawave IP Group Plc，以扩展其人工智能技术。【原文：Qualcomm Inc. has agreed to buy London-listed semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group Plc for about $2.4 billion in cash to expand its technology for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: WPP 首席执行官马克-雷德（Mark Read）即将退休，开始寻找继任者
item.description: WPP Plc.首席执行官马克-雷德（Mark Read）即将退休，全球最大的广告代理集团之一开始寻找继任者。【原文：WPP Plc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Read is to retire, kicking off a search for a successor at one of the world’s largest advertising agency groups.】

item.title: 中国大豆进口创纪录，美国争端引发更多巴西大豆流入中国
item.description: 上个月，中国的大豆进口量攀升至历史新高，原因是人们担心中国与美国的贸易战可能会提振全球大豆价格，而中国作为全球最大的买家，主要从巴西大量采购大豆。【原文：China’s soybean imports climbed to an all-time high last month as the world’s biggest buyer scooped up large volumes mainly from Brazil amid concerns that its trade war with the US could boost global prices.】

item.title: Sunnova 在屋顶太阳能的困境中申请破产
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc. 是美国最大的屋顶太阳能公司之一，由于债务增加和销售前景暗淡，该公司在得克萨斯州申请破产。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., one of the largest US rooftop solar companies, filed for bankruptcy in Texas following struggles with mounting debt and diminishing sales prospects.】

item.title: 在跌宕起伏的债券市场中，意大利和希腊是大赢家
item.description: 上个月，当财政赤字问题震撼全球债券市场时，一件不同寻常的事情发生了。意大利、希腊和西班牙的债券反弹。【原文：As fiscal-deficit concerns rocked global bond markets last month, an unusual thing happened. The bonds of Italy, Greece and Spain rallied.】

item.title: S.韩国总统李明博与日本首相石破茂首次通话，誓言加强两国关系
item.description: 韩国总统李在明和日本首相石破茂举行了首次电话会谈，并誓言要寻求深化双边关系的途径，以便两国能够共同应对未来的挑战。【原文：South Korea’s President Lee Jae-myung and Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba held their first phone conversation and vowed to seek ways to deepen bilateral ties so both nations can respond together to future challenges.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数创纪录在望，英镑上涨
湄公资本计划明年成立 2 亿美元的农业基金
item.description: 湄公河资本有限公司（Mekong Capital Ltd.）是一家专注于越南的私募股权公司，据其创始人兼合伙人克里斯-弗罗因德（Chris Freund）称，该公司计划在 2026 年推出一个再生农业基金，资金规模高达 200 美元。【原文：Mekong Capital Ltd., a Vietnam-focused private equity firm, plans to launch a regenerative agriculture fund in 2026 with as much as $200 in capital, according to its founder and partner Chris Freund.】

item.title: 中美谈判前香港中资股迎来牛市
item.description: 周一收盘时，在香港交易的中国股票有望进入牛市，因为中美两国计划举行的会谈让投资者感到宽慰。【原文：Chinese shares trading in Hong Kong were on course to enter a bull market by Monday’s close, as planned talks between the US and China fuel a wider sense of relief among investors.】

item.description:

item.title: 英国央行面临重蹈脱欧悲观主义覆辙的风险，增长信号出现分歧
item.description: 英国央行的利率制定者们过于相信低迷的商业调查而非官方增长数据，有可能低估英国经济的实力。【原文：Bank of England rate-setters risk underestimating the strength of the UK economy by placing too much faith in downbeat business surveys over official growth data.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴、腾讯在中国高考期间冻结人工智能工具
item.description: 中国最受欢迎的人工智能聊天机器人（如阿里巴巴的 "问问"）暂时关闭了图片识别等功能，以防止学生在中国一年一度的 "高考 "中作弊。【原文：China’s most popular AI chatbots like Alibaba’s Qwen have temporarily disabled functions including picture recognition, to prevent students from cheating during the country’s annual “gaokao” college entrance examinations.】

item.title: 美国贸易谈判前中国稀土出口总量回升
item.description: 周一的海关数据显示，中国 5 月份稀土出口量回升至 5865 吨。【原文：Chinese exports of rare earths, a group of 17 minerals at the center of a trade dispute with Washington, recovered to 5,865 tons in May, according to customs data on Monday.】

item.title: 外国人将韩国债券购买连胜纪录延长至 2023 年以来最长
item.description: 随着新政府的上台，投资者对本地资产的偏好有所改善，韩国债券迎来了自 2023 年 4 月以来最长的外国人连续买入期。【原文：South Korean bonds are enjoying the longest streak of buying by foreigners since April 2023, as investor appetite for local assets improve with the new administration in place.】

item.title: 比特币买家 Metaplanet 因 54 亿美元筹资计划而跃升
item.description: Metaplanet 公司计划融资约 54 亿美元，以增加已经价值近 10 亿美元的比特币储备，该公司股价周一大涨。【原文：Metaplanet Inc.’s plan to raise about $5.4 billion to add to a Bitcoin stockpile that’s already worth close to $1 billion saw the company’s shares jump on Monday.】

item.title: 尽管贸易停战，中国对美出口仍创下 2020 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 中国上个月的出口增幅低于预期，原因是对美国的发货量出现了五年多来最严重的下降，抵消了其他市场的强劲需求。【原文：Chinese exports rose less than expected last month as the worst drop in shipments to the US in more than five years counteracted strong demand from other markets.】

item.title: 据说日本证券开发协会将就不合适的日本债券销售对经纪商进行调查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本证券交易商协会正在调查经纪商的不当债券销售行为，如向发行人夸大对其债务的需求量。【原文：The Japan Securities Dealers Association is probing brokerages on inappropriate bond selling practices such as overstating to issuers how much demand there is for their debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛看好印度消费复苏，股价创历史新高
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团预计，随着国内消费的复苏，印度股市将在本财年下半年创下新高。【原文：Julius Baer Group is expecting Indian stocks to hit a new high in the second half of the fiscal year, as domestic consumption recovers.】

item.title: 随着信贷需求增长，Atome 将从借贷方舟获得 7500 万美元资金
item.description: 随着菲律宾对负担得起的信贷需求的增长，东南亚最大的 "先买后付 "服务提供商 Atome 从 Lending Ark 获得了 7500 万美元的资产担保融资。【原文：Atome, Southeast Asia’s biggest buy now, pay later provider, secured a $75 million asset-backed financing facility from Lending Ark, as demand for affordable credit grows in the Philippines.】

item.title: 印度央行下调巨额利率可能会加速 IPO 进程
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称 "欧佩克+"配额上调尚未带来石油暴涨
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，"欧佩克+"联盟可能会大幅提高石油生产配额，以推动重启闲置产能，但这一转变尚未转化为实际产量的大幅增长。【原文：The OPEC+ alliance may be boosting oil-production quotas at a significant pace in a push to restart idled capacity, but that shift has yet to translate into big gains in actual output, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 华尔街推崇印度市场免受特朗普影响的选择
item.description: 印度股市的涨势最近可能有所停滞，但华尔街银行现在正加倍看好这个世界第五大股票市场，这次的重点是衍生品。【原文：India’s equity rally may have stuttered recently, but Wall Street banks are now doubling down on the world’s fifth-largest stock market, this time focusing on derivatives.】

item.title: 中国消费者通货紧缩态势持续，价格战愈演愈烈
item.description: 由于价格战愈演愈烈，而两个国庆节期间的消费增长又未能抵消国内需求疲软的拖累，中国的消费通缩已延续到第四个月。【原文：China’s consumer deflation extended into a fourth month, as price wars intensified while a spending boost during two national holidays failed to offset the drag from weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判前，黄金在连续两日下跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 在前两个交易日下跌近2%之后，黄金持稳，因为新一轮中美贸易谈判为缓解这两个最大经济体之间的贸易紧张局势带来了希望。【原文：Gold was steady — after losing almost 2% over the previous two sessions — as another round of US-China trade talks offered hope trade tensions between the two largest economies can be eased.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在罕见信函中呼吁住友不动产改进工作
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）呼吁住友不动产开发株式会社（Sumitomo Realty & Development Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management is calling for Sumitomo Realty & Development Co. to improve shareholder returns and corporate governance, saying the Japanese real estate developer’s stock is worth 40% more than its current value.】

item.title: 修订版确认日本国内生产总值萎缩，支持日本央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 由于库存和消费数据有所改善，日本第一季度的经济萎缩幅度小于最初的估计，但日本央行在不确定性加剧的情况下权衡其政策路径时仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Japan’s economy contracted in the first quarter of the year by less than initially estimated on better inventory and consumption figures, while still backing caution by the Bank of Japan as it weighs its policy path amid heightened uncertainty.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判成焦点，石油周线收涨后保持稳定
item.description: 由于新一轮中美贸易谈判为缓解全球紧张局势提供了可能，石油在经历了一周的大涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after after a weekly surge as a renewed round of US-China trade talks offered the potential for reduced global tensions.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的眼球扫描识别技术扩展到英国
item.description: 由 OpenAI 的山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）联合创办的初创公司 Tools for Humanity 正在英国推出眼球扫描 Orb 设备，这是该公司新颖识别服务全球扩张的一部分。【原文：Tools for Humanity, a startup co-founded by OpenAI’s Sam Altman, is rolling out its eyeball-scanning Orb devices to the UK as part of a global expansion of the company’s novel identification services.】
